name: Gravity Jumper (itch) (trega3)
description:
Gravity Jumper is a 3D platformer where you can grab enemies and throw them or use them to propel yourself higher.  Play through two fun levels and defeat the final boss in order to save the Sky Kingdom from destruction!

This is a student project created for CS6457: Video Game Design at the Georgia Institute of Technology. It was made by the following students, in alphabetical order by last name:

- Shane Farrar
- Sam Giuliano
- Sahil Gupta
- Brandon Kalashian
- Thomas Rega
